issues.bug_name: Insert a <!DOCTYPE> declaration to before this <html> tag.
issues.message: Insert a <!DOCTYPE> declaration to before this <html> tag.

issues.bug_name: Add "lang" and/or "xml:lang" attributes to this "<html>" element
issues.message: Add "lang" and/or "xml:lang" attributes to this "<html>" element

issues.rule_description:
With the advent of HTML5, many old elements were deprecated. To ensure the best user experience, deprecated elements should not be used. This rule
checks for the following deprecated elements:

  
    
    
  
  
    
      Element
      Remediation Action
    
  
  
    
      basefont, big, blink, center, font, marquee,
      multicol, nobr, spacer, tt
      use CSS
    
    
      acronym
      use abbr
    
    
      applet
      use embed or object
    
    
      bgsound
      use audio
    
    
      frame, frameset, noframes
      restructure the page to remove frames
    
    
      isindex
      use form controls
    
    
      dir
      use ul
    
    
      hgroup
      use header or div
    
    
      listing
      use pre and code
    
    
      nextid
      use GUIDS
    
    
      noembed
      use object instead of embed when fallback is necessary
    
    
      plaintext
      use the "text/plain" MIME type
    
    
      strike
      use del or s
    
    
      xmp
      use pre or code, and escape "<" and "&" characters
    
  

See

   W3C, Obsolete Features 
   WHATWG, Obsolete Features
